Welcome to PyZUI Documentation!¶

—

PyZUI is an implementation of a Zooming User Interface (ZUI) for Python. Media is laid out upon an infnite virtual desktop, with the user able to pan and zoom through the collection.

PyZUI is compatible with the following media formats:¶

  • All images recognised by ImageMagick

  • PDF documents

  • Remote webpages

  • SVG (vector graphics)

Note

This documentation covers setup, usage, and technical/development documentation for PyZUI.
